TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OracleCommand : System.Data.Common.DbCommand, ICloneable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleCommand extends System.Data.Common.DbCommand implements class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class OracleCommand Inherits DbCommand Implements ICloneable
public ref class OracleCommand sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommand, ICloneable
type OracleCommand = class inherit DbCommand interface ICloneable

summary.span: 表示要对数据库执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型已弃用，将.NET Framework 的未来版本中删除。This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md). 类提供对数据源执行命令的以下方法：The class provides the following methods for executing commands against a data source: |项Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||执行返回行的命令。Executes commands that return rows.| ||针对 执行 SQL 语句并返回受影响的行数。Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.| ||执行命令，例如 SQL INSERT、 DELETE、 更新和一组语句。Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| ||为.NET Framework 数据类型，从数据库中检索单个值 （例如，一个聚合值）。Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database as a .NET Framework data type.| ||为特定于 Oracle 的数据类型，从数据库中检索单个值 （例如，一个聚合值）。Retrieves a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database as an Oracle-specific data type.| 你可以重置属性和重复使用对象。You can reset the property and reuse the object. 如果执行此命令导致了致命、可能会关闭。If execution of the command results in a fatal , the may close. 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. > [!NOTE] > 与不同**命令**中的其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC），对象对象不支持属性。Unlike the **Command** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), the object does not support a property. 设置命令超时不起作用，而返回的值始终为零。Setting a command timeout has no effect and the value returned is always zero. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法，连同和，以从表中选择行。The following example uses the method of , along with and , to select rows from a table. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 尝试取消执行 。

span.span: Attempts to cancel the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有要取消的内容，不执行任何操作。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens. 但是，如果有正在执行的命令，则即使取消尝试失败，也不会生成异常。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，将执行它，然后取消执行。The following example creates an , executes it, then cancels the execution. 若要完成此操作，该方法传递是一个 SQL SELECT 语句的字符串和字符串要用于连接到数据库。To accomplish this, the method is passed a string that is an SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Cancel/VB/source.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Oracle.Design.OracleCommandTextEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置针对数据库执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against the database.

value.span: 要执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`、属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 用户可能需要使用转义符语法，如果存储的过程名称包含任何特殊字符。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 在调用 Execute 方法之一时，该命令将执行此存储的过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. 将参数传递给 SQL 语句调用的适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持的问号 （？） 占位符的`CommandType.Text`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用命名的参数。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如:For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 使用名为 SQL 语句中的参数调用时的`CommandType.Text`，你必须在前面参数名称后的加冒号 （:）。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 但是，在存储过程中，或在其他位置中你的代码的命名参数引用时 (例如，当添加对象添加到属性)，不要在前面添加冒号 （:） 的命名的参数。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). 适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序会自动提供冒号。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandText/VB/source.vb#1)]

The default value is 30 seconds.

One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`，应设置属性设置为完整的 Oracle 调用语法。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the full Oracle call syntax. 该命令然后执行此存储的过程，在调用 Execute 方法之一时 (例如，或)。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, or ). ，和无法设置属性，如果当前的连接执行的 execute 或提取操作。The , and properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 将参数传递给 SQL 语句调用的适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持的问号 （？） 占位符的`CommandType.Text`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用命名的参数。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如:For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 使用名为 SQL 语句中的参数调用时的`CommandType.Text`，你必须在前面参数名称后的加冒号 （:）。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 但是，在存储过程中，或在其他位置中你的代码的命名参数引用时 (例如，当添加对象添加到属性)，不要在前面添加冒号 （:） 的命名的参数。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). 适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序会自动提供冒号。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates an instance of a derived class and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.CommandType/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法设置， ，和如果当前的连接执行的 execute 或提取操作的属性。You cannot set the , , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 如果在事务执行过程中设置了 ，并且 属性不为 null，则会生成 。If you set while a transaction is in progress and the property is not null, an is generated. 如果你设置后提交或回滚，事务和属性不为 null，属性设置为 null 值。If you set after the transaction has been committed or rolled back, and the property is not null, the property is then set to a null value. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Connection/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 针对 执行 SQL 语句并返回受影响的行数。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

returns.span: 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。

span.span: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.

returns.span: 对于 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 语句，返回值为 0。

span.span: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.

returns.span: 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。

span.span: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用执行目录操作 （例如，查询数据库的结构或创建数据库对象，如表）; 或更改数据库中的数据，而无需使用、 通过执行插入、 更新或删除语句。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a , by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 尽管不会返回任何行，任何输出参数或返回值映射到参数填充了数据。Although does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 对于 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 语句，返回值为 0。For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0. 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. 如果发生回滚，则返回值也为-1。If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，然后使用执行它。The following example creates an and then executes it by using . 该示例是一个 SQL 语句 （例如更新、 插入或删除） 的字符串和字符串要用于连接到数据库传递。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement (such as UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE) and a string to use to connect to the database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The connection does not exist.
-or- The connection is not open.

span.span: A base64 string representation of the actual row ID in the server.

summary.span: 针对 执行 SQL 语句并返回受影响的行数。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

returns.span: 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。

span.span: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.

returns.span: 对于 CREATE TABLE 和 DROP TABLE 语句，返回值为 0。

span.span: For CREATE TABLE and DROP TABLE statements, the return value is 0.

returns.span: 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。

span.span: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用执行目录操作 （例如，查询数据库的结构或创建数据库对象，如表）; 或更改数据库中的数据，而无需使用、 通过执行插入、 更新或删除语句。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a , by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 不同于，它将返回`rowid`作为输出参数是否在执行影响恰好一个行的 INSERT、 DELETE 或 UPDATE 语句。 differs from in that it returns `rowid` as an output parameter if you are executing an INSERT, DELETE, or UPDATE statement that affects exactly one row. 这可以唯一标识行在 Oracle 数据库中，可允许你在后续的相关查询中提高性能。This allows you to uniquely identify a row in the Oracle database, which can allow you to increase performance in subsequent, related queries. 尽管不会返回任何行，任何输出参数或返回值映射到参数填充了数据。Although does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data.

span.span: The connection does not exist.
-or- The connection is not open.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object ExecuteOracleScalar() cil managed

summary.span: 执行查询，并将查询返回的结果集中第一行的第一列作为 Oracle 特定的数据类型返回。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query as an Oracle-specific data type.

summary.span: 忽略其他列或行。

span.span: Extra columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: 结果中第一行的第一列会被设置为特定于 Oracle 的数据类型，或者，如果结果为 ，则为 null 引用。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set as an Oracle-specific data type, or a null reference if the result is a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以从数据库中检索单个值 （例如，一个聚合值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 这要求更少的代码比使用方法，，然后再执行的操作需要从返回的数据生成单个值。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value from the data returned by an . 典型查询可进行格式设置如下面的 C# 示例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` command.CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) AS NumberOfRegions FROM Region"; count = command.ExecuteOracleScalar(); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`、属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 该命令然后执行此存储的过程，当您调用。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call . 多个可以打开在任何给定时间。More than one can be open at any given time. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，然后通过传递的是 SQL SELECT 语句的字符串和字符串要用于连接到数据源执行它。The following example creates an , and then executes it by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the data source. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望 SQL 语句以返回单个行，指定`SingleRow`作为值可能会提高应用程序性能。If you expect your SQL statement to return only a single row, specifying `SingleRow` as the value may improve application performance. 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`、属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 该命令然后执行此存储的过程，当您调用。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call . 支持使大型二进制值，以高效读取以特殊模式。The supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 多个可以打开在任何给定时间。More than one can be open at any given time. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，然后通过传递的是 SQL SELECT 语句的字符串和字符串要用于连接到数据库中执行它。The following example creates an , and then executes it by passing a string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string to use to connect to the database. 然后将设置为。 is then set to . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteReader2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteReader2/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteReader2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteReader2/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 执行查询，并将查询返回的结果集中第一行的第一列作为 .NET Framework 数据类型返回。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query as a .NET Framework data type.

summary.span: 忽略其他列或行。

span.span: Extra columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: .NET Framework 数据类型形式的结果集第一行的第一列；如果结果集为空或结果为 ，则为 null 引用。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set as a .NET Framework data type, or a null reference if the result set is empty or the result is a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以从数据库中检索单个值 （例如，一个聚合值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 这要求更少的代码比使用方法，，然后再执行的操作需要从返回的数据生成单个值。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value from the data returned by an . 典型查询可进行格式设置如下面的 C# 示例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` CommandText = "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Region"; Int32 count = (int32) ExecuteScalar(); ``` ## Examples 下面的示例创建，然后执行它使用。The following example creates an and then executes it using . 该示例传递是返回聚合结果，一个 SQL 语句的字符串和要用于连接到数据库的字符串。The example is passed a string that is an SQL statement that returns an aggregate result, and a string to use to connect to the database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As OracleParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取 。

span.span: Gets the .

value.span: SQL 语句或存储过程的参数。

span.span: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`、属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 用户可能需要使用转义符语法，如果存储的过程名称包含任何特殊字符。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 在调用 Execute 方法之一时，该命令将执行此存储的过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. 将参数传递给 SQL 语句调用的适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持的问号 （？） 占位符的`CommandType.Text`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle does not support the question mark (?) placeholder for passing parameters to an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用命名的参数。In this case, named parameters must be used. 例如:For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = :pCustomerID ``` 使用名为 SQL 语句中的参数调用时的`CommandType.Text`，你必须在前面参数名称后的加冒号 （:）。When using named parameters in an SQL statement called by an of `CommandType.Text`, you must precede the parameter name with a colon (:). 但是，在存储过程中，或在其他位置中你的代码的命名参数引用时 (例如，当添加对象添加到属性)，不要在前面添加冒号 （:） 的命名的参数。However, in a stored procedure, or when referring to a named parameter elsewhere in your code (for example, when adding objects to the property), do not precede the named parameter with a colon (:). 适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序会自动提供冒号。The .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle supplies the colon automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并显示其参数。The following example creates an and displays its parameters. 若要完成此操作，该方法传递，是 SQL SELECT 语句，并将一个数组的查询字符串对象。To accomplish this, the method is passed an , a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and an array of objects. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleCommand.Parameters/VB/source.vb#1)]

An .
The default is a null value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法设置如果它已被设置为特定值，并且该命令正在执行的属性。You cannot set the property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing. 如果事务属性设置为未连接到相同的对象作为对象，尝试执行语句，则下一步时将引发异常。If you set the transaction property to an object that is not connected to the same as the object, an exception will be thrown the next time you attempt to execute a statement.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the method should apply command results to the .
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值值是`Both`除非自动生成命令 (一样的情况下)，默认值是在这种情况下`None`。The default value is `Both` unless the command is automatically generated (as in the case of the ), in which case the default is `None`. 有关使用属性，请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information about using the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).

exception.span: 输入的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value entered was not one of the values.
